about_the_game:
Uncover the Secrets of Serum's Story: Delve deep into the lore of Serum with the Serum Story Codex. Compiled from meticulously arranged diary entries and enriched with detailed explanations, this Codex unravels the mysteries surrounding the game's narrative. From the enigmatic origins of the island to the sinister machinations of E.V.A.S, discover the full story behind Serum like never before.

How to access the Digital Goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the game’s install directory within their respective folder in Steam\SteamApps\common\Serum after the DLC has finished downloading.
